About Portfolio

Portfolio

Highrise

Highrise is a flexible tool that helps your business stay organized. It’s got all your tasks, notes, emails, are all in one place. I’m currently an intern working with the awesome team at Highrise.

Check out Highrise

Noodles

Noodles is an app to help you keep, cook, and share all your recipes. I released it as my first app in November, 2014. Built with Rails, React, and a few other things.

Try Noodles

Helpful

Helpful is a beautiful and simple support tool I helped build on (the original) Assembly. “Help shouldn’t hurt” — Helpful is designed to be fast and straightforward to use. I released it along with some teammates in the summer of 2014. Built on Rails and React.

Check out Helpful

Whiteboard

Whiteboard is a Ruby gem I worked on with @nbashaw. It’s the fastest way to start building new Rails apps.

See Whiteboard on GitHub

This site was built with Jekyll, Basscss, and GitHub Pages.
